Nothing spectacular. Still me though

Hi, my name is flo. I am a front-end dev based in France. I work as Director of Customer Experience at odaseva, a young and dynamic tech company.

odaseva

A team of Salesforce (and more) specialists behind Odaseva, a platform currently providing Salesforce customers with Backup & Restore, Archiving and GDPR capabilities. The company has a wide range of enterprise customers, including Fortune 500 companies, and operates from both France and the United States.
If you're into Salesforce and GDPR chek out odaseva.com

Development addict

Developer by day,... developer by night. The design and development experience I have gathered during 15+ years spent within various firms has made me an addict to the Front-end subject. I quickly specialized in responsive web design (like everybody else) when the trend emerged, often use Wordpress, Perch and Jekyll as prefered CMS solutions, and like to get involved in mentorship.

Wanna discuss mentorship / Say Hi ?
